damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

lore: The primary battle tanks of the Asuryani, Falcons mount a diverse array of potent weapons that make them the bane of war machines and foot troops alike. They also boast a transport pod, in which small squads of warriors can be borne to wherever on the battlefield their martial prowess is most needed.

otherAbilities.Fire Support:: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the turn, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this Transport this turn makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll .
